actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that proceeds from identical wagers shall not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether tax should be withheld on such proceeds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that proceeds from identical wagers shall not be aggregated for purposes of determining the withholding of tax on certain gambling winnings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that proceeds from identical wagers shall not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether tax should be withheld on such proceeds.
